test_mode.label: Test Mode
test_mode.comment: Only generation of files, no transfer

disable_certificate_check.label: Disable check of SSL certificate
disable_certificate_check.comment: In case you have problems with the connection

configurable_child_products_price.label: Calculate price of configurable child products as
configurable_child_products_price.comment: Use option "child product" or "parent product without modifications" for better performance. There can be memory leaks with the option "parent product with modifications".

add_attributes_to_export.label: Add contents of the following attribute(s) to the export

add_attribute_contents_to_name.label: Add contents of the following attribute(s) to product name

export_flexible_price_bundles.label: Export Bundle Products without a fixed price
export_flexible_price_bundles.comment: No Price will be available for those products

mapping.label: Mapping
mapping.comment: If no country specific value is set, delivery time will not be exported.

shipping_costs.label: Shipping Cost based on Price
shipping_costs.comment: Only for Shipping Costs Calculation Method "Price" (see above)

shipping_costs_by_weight.label: Shipping Cost based on Weight
shipping_costs_by_weight.comment:
Only for Shipping Costs Calculation Method "Weight" (see above)
Product attribute "Weight" [weight] will be used to determine weight.

Surcharge for Orders below Minimum Order Weight
